name: RAPL_XS_FUNC_CHK_PKG_POWER_LIMIT_MSR
summary: Check whether PKG Domain RAPL POWER LIMIT MSR 0x610 is enabled or not, which is the prerequisite of loading intel_rapl driver,  if the value is non-zero means PKG Domain power limit is enabled, otherwise it's not enabled, perform this case in pre-silicon and Power On platform to check RAPL PKG Power limit MSR level enabling status in simics and HW/FW.
